title: Unemployment Benefits Calculator
description: If you are eligible to receive unemployment benefits, you will receive a weekly benefit amount of approximately 50% of your average weekly wage, up to the maximum set by law. As of Oct. 4, 2021 the maximum weekly benefit amount is $974 per week.
This calculator helps you estimate your benefits. It is only advisory. You will be notified of your outcome and benefit determination 3-4 weeks after you apply.
